name: otlp-logging
description: Guidance for OpenTelemetry Protocol (OTLP) logging and observability in .NET. USE FOR: OTLP log export, OpenTelemetry traces and metrics, distributed tracing with Activity API, configuring OTel collectors, correlating logs with traces, custom metrics and instruments. DO NOT USE FOR: Serilog-specific sinks and enrichers (use serilog), NLog-specific targets and routing (use nlog), Microsoft.Extensions.Logging abstractions (use extensions-logging).
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
